update.description:
We currently have conversion functions between gazebo::msg and SDF, in [gazebo::msgs::msgs.hh](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/ca2a71952a3823494afe2aafe9b6996c40e31539/gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default). As we move to ign-msgs, I propose we add the equivalent conversion functions to `util::IgnMsgSdf`, in the following format:

* **ign-msgs -> SDF**: `gazebo::util::<msg type>IgnMsgToSdf`
* **SDF -> ign-msgs**: `gazebo::util::<msg type>SdfToIgnMsg`

Suggestions are very welcome.
update.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

pull_request.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

pullrequest.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

content.raw: I'll merge this now. I suppose we can remove the direct check for ign-msgs here at the same time as we upgrade to ign-transport2, if we so desire.
content.html: I'll merge this now. I suppose we can remove the direct check for ign-msgs here at the same time as we upgrade to ign-transport2, if we so desire.

content.raw: Oh I see, I thought Gazebo default was already using `ign-transport2`. I think this PR can wait until that is released.
content.html: Oh I see, I thought Gazebo default was already using ign-transport2. I think this PR can wait until that is released.

pull_request.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

pullrequest.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

content.raw: Ignition-transport1 does not find and include ignition-msgs. You could wait until ignition-transport2 is released, and then update gazebo to depend on ignition-transport2.
content.html: Ignition-transport1 does not find and include ignition-msgs. You could wait until ignition-transport2 is released, and then update gazebo to depend on ignition-transport2.

pull_request.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

pullrequest.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

content.raw:
Thanks, I'm building it now. The templated conversion functions look great :)

About looking for ign-msgs, wouldn't it be simpler for Gazebo to rely on the version that ign-transport brings? I don't understand why we need to look for it in two places.
content.html:
Thanks, I'm building it now. The templated conversion functions look great :)

About looking for ign-msgs, wouldn't it be simpler for Gazebo to rely on the version that ign-transport brings? I don't understand why we need to look for it in two places.

pullrequest.title: Conversion between ign msg and sdf, for plugin

content.raw:
What version of ignition-transport do you have installed?

This pull request needs ignition-msgs, but gazebo's cmake is not finding the package. I assume your version of ignition-transport brings in the necessary including directories and libraries.
content.html:
What version of ignition-transport do you have installed?

This pull request needs ignition-msgs, but gazebo's cmake is not finding the package. I assume your version of ignition-transport brings in the necessary including directories and libraries.
